resources.string:
"AdMob is one of the world's largest mobile advertising networks, offering solutions for discovery, branding and monetization on the mobile web.
Website: admob.com
Ads have been filtered for childrens safe viewing, however maybe you don't like some ads in a game for kids. If so, you consider to buy our ads-free key application to remove Ads in all of apps/games published by us. "

"No more ads in the game but there is one ad a day in the phone's notication bar. Your kids are free to play without any unknown ads. If you don't like some ads in your notication bar, consider to buy our ads-free key to remove key from all of apps/games published by us. Founded in Los Angeles by mobile advertising veterans, Airpush is the first mobile ad network based on push notifications. They're ads appear in the notification tray of Android devices, where they can be viewed at the user's convenience rather than while using an app. Website: airpush.com"

"No more ads in all of game published by RubyCell.All you need to do is just install our Ads-free key application and you will forget about ads in all kids game published by us: Kids TV, Kids Song, The Best Jigsaw Puzzle, Coloring Game, The best shape kid puzzle, ABC flash card etc.. Open the \"Ads-Free Key\" application to show the game list.(comming soon) Have fun with our best quality game. If you think one of game from us is not the best, email us and we will fix it in 2 business days. Thank you for your support."

"Mobclix ad are fillted and therefore make sure your kids can not see any adult/dating ads in the game.
Website: mobclix.com"
